name: Passion Spanish
description:
Hello¡ My name  is Gearhala and I am a young.poor type 1 diabetic and partner team . This project is to make a language learning video game that gives you the spanish upgrade as a part of your quest. In turn the experience should feel a little more like an actual game and less like a a forced exercise. Memory palace techniques will hopefully be put to good use here as I plan to use very similiar associative cues. I'll be uploading updated demo every week or so and hoping to finish it here soon hopefully by the end of the month for this Game Jam

I tried to add many mini-games that include a short story loosely based on a ghost freeing a dark spirit and rediscovering a bond with su hijo.

definitely play the ghost character path first , its more developed.

download link below available for PC or MAC,

android version coming soon!

Hasta la proxima vez

Until the next time

Paz , Peace
